name: Google Calendar Dark Theme [V1.0.7]
description: Manage your calendar at night with this dark theme! Check out my other Google dark themes: Google Search Dark Theme Google Translate Dark Theme Google Classroom Dark Theme Google Drive Dark Theme Dark Theme for Google Docs (includes Calendar)

user.name: Lekrkoekj
user.about: Hello there! I make dark themes for websites (mostly Google sites). I'm very inactive though

additional_info: Version 1.0.7 The profile chooser is dark again. Version 1.0.6 The top bar is dark again. The profile chooser is fully dark again. Version 1.0.5 The header is dark again. The profile chooser is dark again. The settings menu is dark again. Small text color changes Version 1.0.4 The profile chooser is fully dark again. Version 1.0.3 The top bar is fully dark again. The side bar is fully dark again. The profile menu is fully dark again. Version 1.0.2 Calendar is now fully dark again for G-Suite users. All view types are now fully dark again. Version 1.0.1 The Calendar sidebar in Docs is now fully dark. The Keep sidebar is now dark. The Tasks sidebar is now dark. Version 1.0 Initial release.
